page.title: 08LIFE ON MY FARM,COTEHILL
page.content: Every day I feed the pet lambs with feed and water and mangolds. On Saturday me and my dad finished plnting potatoes, barley, mangolds and turnips .We started to sell the lambs. My dad has stared to shear his sheep. My dad has started to grub the potatoes. The grubber takes the weeds off the potatoes. My dad has put up a sign that said," No dogs allowed" because people go down with dogs and they aren't on a lead when there are sheep down at the River Eden. My dad has already found two sheep dead.
